Package org.vadere.gui.topographycreator.control

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionBasic
    A ActionBasic is the last action in the decorator pattern which will be execute.
    ActionCloseDrawOptionPanel
    Action: Hide the PaintMethodDialog Window.
    ActionCopyElement
    Copies the reference of an ScenarioElement and put it into the panelmodel.
    ActionDeleteElement  
    ActionInsertCopiedElement
    Insert the last copied element in the topography if this element is not null.
    ActionMaximizeSize
    Action: Reset the size of the scenario to the default value.
    ActionMinimizeSize
    Action: Switch to selection mode to SelectViewportMode.
    ActionOpenDrawOptionMenu
    Action: Opens the menu containing a set of drawing methods (for example: rectangle, pen, ...).
    ActionOpenSetSizePanel
    Action: Opens the SetScenarioBoundDialog.
    ActionOpenSetTopographyScale
    Action: Opens the SetScenarioScaleDialog.
    ActionQuickSaveTopography
    Action: save the topography to the current file (last_save_point).
    ActionRedo
    Action: redo the last action.
    ActionResetTopography
    Action: Resets the Topography.
    ActionSaveTopography
    Action: save the topography to a new file.
    ActionScaleTopography
    Action: Scales the scenario, so every VShape of the ScenarioElement will be changed.
    ActionSelectCut
    Action: Cuts the Topography so the TopographyBound will be changed.
    ActionSelectSelectShape
    Action: Selects the SelectShapeMode, so after this action the user can select ScenarioElements.
    ActionSwitchCategory
    Action: Switches the ScenarioElementType of the IDrawPanelModel to a specific type.
    ActionSwitchSelectionMode
    Action: Switches the SelectionMode to a specific mode.
    ActionUndo
    Action: Undo the last action.
    ActionZoomIn
    Action: Sets the selection mode to ZoomInMode, so the user can zoom in if he hit the mouse button.
    ActionZoomOut
    Action: Sets the selection mode to ZoomOutMode, so the user can zoom out if he hit the mouse button.
    CutScenarioMode
    In this mode the user can cut the Topography with the mouse.
    DrawDotMode
    In this mode VCircles will be generated.
    DrawEllipseMode
    In this mode VEllipse will be generated.
    DrawPolygonMode
    In this mode VPolygons will be generated.
    DrawRectangleMode
    In this mode Retangles will be generated.
    EditChangeScenarioBound
    Part of the command pattern to re- and undo setTopographyBound.
    EditCutScenario
    Part of the command pattern to re- and undo cutTopography.
    EditDeleteShape
    Part of the command pattern to re- and undo setRemoveScenarioElement.
    EditDrawShape
    Part of the command pattern to re- and undo addScenarioElement.
    EditResetScenario
    Part of the command pattern to re- and undo resetTopography.
    EditScaleScenario
    Part of the command pattern to re- and undo scaleTopography.
    EditUpdateElementShape  
    EraserMode
    In this mode the user is able to remove ScenarioElements with his mouse.
    ReflectionAttributeModifier
    Setter and getter implementation to modify Attributes.
    SelectElementMode
    In this mode the user can select a ScenarioElement with his mouse (click) and he can move elements around (press -> drag -> release).
    SelectViewportMode
    In this mode the user can redefine the viewport with his mouse.
    TopographyAction
    Each Action of the topographycreator gets the panelModel because each action change the panelModel.
    UndoAdaptor
    Part of the command-pattern (undo/redo-logic)
    ZoomInMode
    In this mode the user is able to zoom in by clicking his mouse and not only by using the mouse wheel.
    ZoomOutMode
    In this mode the user is able to zoom out by clicking his mouse and not only by using the mouse wheel.
